data.name: Fluent Calculator C#
data.description:
Based on Fluent Calculator (https://www.codewars.com/kata/fluent-calculator-1), but without reflection

The task at hand is to make a simple fluent calculator.

The design should be seperated into two builders to handle Values and Operations
Values can call Operations, and Operations can call values, however they should not be able to call themselves.
```c-sharp
var calculator = new FluentCalculator();
calculator.One.Times.Two.Result() //This should return 2
calculator.One.One //Should Error
```

The Values should resolve implicitly to a double
```c-sharp
double myInt = 5.5 - Calculator.One.Plus.Two
```

A whole expression should be created before evaulation, and the evaluation should follow BEDMAS
```c-sharp
//0-4*3+2/8*1/9 = -11.972
calculator.Zero.Minus.Four.Times.Three.Plus.Two.DividedBy.Eight.Times.One.DividedBy.Nine
```
